sentences: Albin Lee Meldau (born February 8, 1988) is a Swedish singer, songwriter and musician.
He self-released his debut EP, Lovers, in 2016 with help from producer Bj√∂rn Yttling (of Peter Bjorn and John).
Later that year, Albin signed to Astralwerks, who re-released his Lovers EP, and in 2017 released the follow-up Bloodshot EP.
